arts.ttl: Rangers vs AS Roma – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Rangers are set to host AS Roma at Ibrox this Thursday as both teams aim to turn around their disappointing starts to the UEFA Europa League campaign. The Scottish side have yet to register a win in the competition so far, while their Italian opponents have already experienced two home defeats in this group stage. arts.ttl: Rangers vs AS Roma – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Rangers will welcome AS Roma to Ibrox on Thursday evening as both sides look to kick-start their disappointing UEFA Europa League campaigns. The Scottish giants remain winless in the competition this term, whilst their Italian visitors have already suffered two home defeats in the group stage.
